astro/

jb_rgbpng.pro


top source jb_rgbpng

Astro

jb_rgbpng, filename, rimage, gimage, bimage, scale=scale, nonlinearity=nonlinearity

Turn individual image frames into an RGB PNG image file.

Parameters

filename in

Name of output .PNG file.

rimage in

2D image array to put in red channel. Assumed to be already scaled from 0-255.

gimage in

2D image array to put in green channel. Assumed to be already scaled from 0-255.

bimage in

2D image array to put in blue channel. Assumed to be already scaled from 0-255.

Keywords

scale in

3-element array of relative scaling for R, G, and B images respectively.

nonlinearity

File attributes
